dashboard.totalIncomeDesc: Mkpokọta ego abata gụnyere ahịa na isi mmalite ndị ọzọ

inventory.noProductsDesc: Gbalịa ịhazigharị nhọrọ gị iji chọta ihe ị na-achọ.
inventory.noProductsGetStarted: Malite site na itinye ngwaahịa mbụ gị na ngwa ahịa.

sales.title: Ahịa
sales.subtitle: Chekwaa ma jikwaa ahịa gị
sales.noSalesDesc: Malite ịdekọ ahịa iji chekwaa arụmọrụ azụmaahịa gị

finance.subtitle: Jikwaa ego abata na mmefu gị

loans.title: Mgbazinye Ego
loans.subtitle: Jikwaa mgbazinye ego na nkwụghachi
loans.noLoansDesc: Mepụta mgbazinye ego iji malite ịchekwa
loans.loansManagementDesc: Mepụta ụlọ ahịa mbụ gị iji malite ịdekọ mgbazinye ego na nkwụghachi.

savings.title: Nchekwa Ego
savings.subtitle: Chekwaa ebumnuche nchekwa gị
savings.noPlansDesc: Mepụta atụmatụ nchekwa iji malite ịchekwa
savings.manageSavingsPlans: Jikwaa atụmatụ nchekwa gị ma chekwaa ntinye gị
savings.savingsManagementDesc: Mepụta ụlọ ahịa mbụ gị iji malite ịmepụta atụmatụ nchekwa, ịchekwa ntinye, na ịrụ ọrụ ebumnuche ego gị.

settings.title: Ntọala
settings.subtitle: Jikwaa akaụntụ gị na ntọala ụlọ ahịa
settings.noStoreMessage: Ị nwebeghị ụlọ ahịa. Mepụta ụlọ ahịa mbụ gị iji malite.
settings.storeNameUpdated: Emelitela aha ụlọ ahịa nke ọma
settings.storeLocationUpdated: Emelitela ebe ụlọ ahịa nke ọma
settings.storeMarketUpdated: Emelitela ahịa ụlọ ahịa nke ọma
settings.hideBalanceDesc: Mgbe enyere ya, a ga-ezo ozi ego na dashbọọdụ
settings.languageDescription: Họrọ asụsụ ịhọrọ maka isi okwu na aha ngalaba
settings.installDescription: Nweta ahụmahụ kacha mma na ngwa ekwentị anyị - na-arụ ọrụ n'enweghị intanetị, na-ebu ngwa ngwa, na ọkwa ozi!
settings.manualInstallDesc: Jiri nhọrọ 'Tinye na Ngosi Ụlọ' nke ihe nchọgharị gị wụnye ngwa ahụ

help.title: Ebe Enyemaka
help.subtitle: Nweta enyemaka na nkwado
help.description: Chọta azịza nye ajụjụ gị ma mụta otu esi eji SheBalance nke ọma
help.userManualDescription: Ntuziaka zuru ezu maka iji njirimara na ọrụ SheBalance
help.audioLearningDescription: Gee ntị ma mụta ndekọ ego n'asụsụ ịhọrọ
help.audioTutorialsDescription: E mere nkuzi olu anyị iji nyere gị aka ịghọta echiche ndekọ ego n'asụsụ ịhọrọ. Nkuzi ọ bụla na-ekpuchi isiokwu dị mkpa dị ka ịdekọ azụmahịa, ijikwa akaụntụ, na idobe ndekọ ego ziri ezi.
help.pdfDocumentTitle: Ndekọ Ego Maka Gị - Akwụkwọ PDF

pdfContent.separateMoney: Otu Esi Ekewa Ego Azụmaahịa na Ego Onwe
pdfContent.moneyInOut: Ịghọta Ego Na-abata na Ego Na-apụ
pdfContent.contributionStrategy: Ntinye Aka Dị ka Atụmatụ Ịkpọlite Ego
pdfContent.loansDebt: Inweta Mgbazinye Ego Obere na Ijikwa Ụgwọ Nke Ọma
pdfContent.growingBusiness: Ime Ka Azụmaahịa Gị Too Site na Ndekọ Ego Dị Mma

help.moreTopics: Na ọtụtụ isiokwu bara uru ọzọ...
help.adjustSearchFilters: Gbalịa ịhazigharị nchọgharị ma ọ bụ nhọrọ gị

audioTutorials.englishDescription: Mụta isi ihe ndekọ ego, gụnyere ịdekọ azụmahịa, ijikwa akaụntụ, na idobe ndekọ ego.
audioTutorials.yorubaDescription: Kọ́ àwọn ìpilẹ̀ ìṣirò owó, títẹ̀ àwọn ìṣòwò, àti ìṣàkóso àwọn àkọsílẹ̀ owó.
audioTutorials.pidginTitle: Otu Esi Eme Ndekọ Ego Maka Ndị Na-amalite
audioTutorials.pidginDescription: Mụta otu esi ede ihe gbasara ego gị, idebe ndekọ azụmaahịa gị, ma jikwaa akaụntụ gị nke ọma.
audioTutorials.hausaDescription: Koyi tushen rubutun kudade, da yadda ake rubuta kasuwanci, da kula da bayanan kudi.
audioTutorials.igboDescription: Mụta ụzọ isi edekọ ego, ịdepụta azụmahịa, na ijikwa ndekọ ego niile.

introduction.title: Okwu Mmalite
introduction.subtitle: Nnọọ na SheBalance
introduction.description: SheBalance bụ ngwa njikwa ego e mere iji nyere ndị mmadụ na azụmaahịa aka ịchekwa ahịa, jikwaa mmefu, nyochaa ngwa ahịa, chekwaa ego, ma debe ndekọ ego ziri ezi. Akwụkwọ ntuziaka a na-enye ntuziaka dị mfe nke usoro site na usoro otu esi eji ngwa ahụ nke ọma.
introduction.step1: Chekwaa ahịa na ego abata n'ụzọ dị mfe
introduction.step4: Mepụta atụmatụ nchekwa ma nyochaa ọganihu
introduction.step5: Debe ndekọ ego dị ọcha n'otu ebe

gettingStarted.title: Mepụta Akaụntụ & Ịbanye
gettingStarted.subtitle: Imepụta Akaụntụ & Ịbanye
gettingStarted.description: Mepụta akaụntụ SheBalance gị wee banye iji nweta dashbọọdụ gị.
gettingStarted.step1: Iji budata ngwa SheBalance na Android, gaa www.shebalance.org wee pịa okwu nwụnye mgbe ọ pụtara
gettingStarted.step2: Iji budata ngwa SheBalance na iOS, gaa www.shebalance.org na safari, pịa bọtịnụ ịkekọrịta, wee pịa bọtịnụ 'Tinye na Ngosi Ụlọ'
gettingStarted.step4: Jupụta nkọwa gị dị ka aha, nọmba ekwentị, na paswọọdụ.
gettingStarted.step5: Kwado akaụntụ gị (ị nwere ike ịnata koodu site na email).
gettingStarted.step6: Iji banye, tinye nọmba ekwentị/email gị na paswọọdụ ka ịbanye.
gettingStarted.step7: Mgbe ịbanyere, a ga-eduga gị na Dashbọọdụ.

dashboard.title: Nlele Dashbọọdụ
dashboard.subtitle: Ịghọta Dashbọọdụ
dashboard.description: Dashbọọdụ gị na-enye nlele nke ọrụ ego gị.
dashboard.step1: Mkpokọta Ego Abata: Ego e nwetara site na ahịa
dashboard.step2: Mkpokọta Ahịa: Ọnụọgụgụ azụmahịa ahịa emechara
dashboard.step3: Mkpokọta Nchekwa: Ego echekwara n'atụmatụ nchekwa
dashboard.step4: Ọkwa Ngwaahịa Dị Ole: Ngwaahịa na-agwụ na ngwaahịa
dashboard.step5: Mkpokọta Ego Abata: Ego abata niile edekọrọ

inventory.title: Njikwa Ngwa Ahịa
inventory.description1: Jikwaa ngwaahịa na ọkwa ngwaahịa nke ọma.
inventory.step1_2: Uru Ngwa Ahịa: Mkpokọta uru ihe niile dị na ngwaahịa
inventory.step1_3: Ngwaahịa Na-ere Nke Ọma: Ngwaahịa erere kachasị
inventory.step1_4: Ọkwa Ngwaahịa Dị Ole: Ọkwa mgbe ngwaahịa dị n'okpuru oke ya
inventory.description2: Tinye ngwaahịa n'ngwa ahịa gị ngwa ngwa.
inventory.step2_2: Tinye aha ngwaahịa, ọnụ ahịa ịzụta, ọnụ ahịa otu, na ọnụọgụgụ

productDetails.title: Nkọwa Ngwaahịa
productDetails.subtitle: Ijikwa Ngwaahịa
productDetails.description: Lee nkọwa ngwaahịa ma mee ngwa ngwa omume.
productDetails.step1: Hụ aha ngwaahịa, ọnụ ahịa otu, ọnụọgụgụ, na ọnọdụ ngwaahịa
productDetails.step2: Dezie, Tinye ngwaahịa ọzọ, Hichapụ, ma ọ bụ Tinye na Ọkacha Mmasị
productDetails.step3: Nyochaa nnweta ma melite ngwaahịa n'ụzọ dị mfe

sales.title: Njikwa Ahịa
sales.description1: Chekwaa arụmọrụ ahịa gị na uru.
sales.step1_1: Mkpokọta Ahịa: Mkpokọta ego e nwetara
sales.step1_3: Mkpokọta Uru: Dabere na ọnụ ahịa ịzụta na ọnụ ahịa ire
sales.step2_2: Họrọ ngwaahịa site na ngwa ahịa
sales.step2_4: Họrọ usoro ịkwụ ụgwọ: Ego, Mbufe, ma ọ bụ Kredit
sales.description3: Ahịa ọ bụla gụnyere nkọwa dị mkpa maka ntụaka.
sales.step3_2: Ngwaahịa, ego, na usoro ịkwụ ụgwọ

finance.title: Njikwa Ego
finance.description1: Chekwaa ego niile na-abata na ego na-apụ maka azụmaahịa gị.
finance.step1_1: Mkpokọta Ego Abata: Ego niile a natara
finance.step1_3: Ego Fọdụrụ: Ego abata na-ewepu mmefu
finance.description2: Mepụta ndekọ ego abata ma ọ bụ mmefu.
finance.step2_2: Họrọ ụdị: Ego Abata ma ọ bụ Mmefu
finance.step2_5: Họrọ ndekọ site na ụdị ma ọ bụ ụbọchị dịka ọ dị mkpa

savings.title: Njikwa Nchekwa
savings.description1: Hazie ma chekwaa nchekwa n'ebumnobi gị.
savings.step1_3: Họrọ Oge (Kwa Ụbọchị/Kwa Izu/Kwa Ọnwa) na Ego Ebumnobi
savings.description2: Chekwaa ọganihu, tinye ego, wepụ ego, ma ọ bụ hichapụ atụmatụ.
savings.step2_2: Wepụ ego mgbe ọ dị mkpa
savings.step2_3: Họrọ atụmatụ: Ka Malitere, Na-aga N'ihu, Emechara, Ewepụrụ

settings.title: Ntọala
settings.subtitle: Jikwaa Ụlọ Ahịa Gị & Nzuzo
settings.description: Melite ozi ụlọ ahịa, nzuzo, na njikwa akaụntụ.
settings.step1: Ozi Ụlọ Ahịa: Dezie aha ụlọ ahịa, ebe, na ahịa
settings.step2: Ntọala Nzuzo: Họrọ ime ka nkọwa ụlọ ahịa pụta ìhè ma ọ bụ zoo ya
settings.step3: Mpaghara Dị Ize Ndụ: Hichapụ ụlọ ahịa ma ọ bụ hichapụ akaụntụ kpamkpam (enweghị ike ịmegharị ya)

conclusion.title: Njedebe
conclusion.subtitle: Ị dị njikere ịga!
conclusion.description: SheBalance na-eme ka ọ dị mfe ijikwa ahịa gị, mmefu, nchekwa, na ngwa ahịa n'otu ebe. Jiri akwụkwọ ntuziaka a dị ka ntuziaka iji malite ma mee ka ngwa ahụ dịkwuo mma maka njikwa ego ka mma.
conclusion.step1: Debe ndekọ gị ka ọ dị ọhụrụ
conclusion.step2: Jiri dashbọọdụ mee mkpebi nwere amamihe
conclusion.step3: Jiri atụmatụ nchekwa rute ebumnobi gị
